data.title: Wii U? - Animal Crossing: City Folk
data.meta_description: Does anyone know if there's a way to get City Folk online to visit friends on the Wii U? I have an original wii and I can

Wii U?

Does anyone know if there's a way to get City Folk online to visit friends on the Wii U? I have an original wii and I can get online, but I have a friend who has a Wii U and we can't figure out if there is a way to get his console connected so we can visit each other. I've tried searching the net, but most results that I find that come up are for the original Wii, and usually note that it doesn't work on Wii U (obviously). If anyone knows a way to do it, is there somewhere with detailed instructions?

Thanks for any replies.

Daisy
